description: Get the comfort and warmth of their warmest-weight base layer in a pullover with their new Men's Merino 250 Base Layer Hoodie. Featuring a mountain-inspired pattern and a higher neck on the hood for more coverage when worn down, this 100% Merino wool hoodie makes it easy to get inspired and feel prepared to brave the cold weather for your next adventure.
name: Smartwool Classic Thermal Merino 250 Base Layer Hoodie - Mens
